CustomField.formula:
IF( Removal_Date__c = null,null, IF( MONTH(Removal_Date__c) > MONTH( Child__r.Date_of_Birth__c ), TEXT(YEAR(Removal_Date__c) - YEAR(Child__r.Date_of_Birth__c)) & " Years " , IF(( MONTH(Removal_Date__c) = MONTH( Child__r.Date_of_Birth__c)) &&(DAY(Removal_Date__c) >= DAY(Child__r.Date_of_Birth__c)) ,TEXT(YEAR(Removal_Date__c) - YEAR(Child__r.Date_of_Birth__c)) & " Years " , TEXT( YEAR(Removal_Date__c) - YEAR(Child__r.Date_of_Birth__c) - 1 )& " Years ") )) &
IF( MONTH (Removal_Date__c) = MONTH (Child__r.Date_of_Birth__c), IF(DAY(Removal_Date__c) >= DAY(Child__r.Date_of_Birth__c), "","11 Months"), IF(MONTH(Child__r.Date_of_Birth__c) > MONTH(Removal_Date__c), TEXT(12 - (MONTH(Child__r.Date_of_Birth__c) - MONTH(Removal_Date__c))) & " Months", TEXT(MONTH(Removal_Date__c) - MONTH(Child__r.Date_of_Birth__c)) & " Months"))
CustomField.label: Removal Age
